description:
Beautiful, exposed-brick 1-bedroom just 2 Blocks from Union Square (N, R, W, Q, 4, 5, 6, L) Easy access to East Village restaurants and nightlife, and walking distance to Washington Square, West Village, and SoHo. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Full bed sleeps 2, and couch in living room can comfortably sleep 1 if needed. 

5th floor walk-up w/ windows on the back of the building, above and away from night traffic & noise. 

Empty dresser drawers, hangers, and iron so you don't have to live out of a suitcase. 

Bright, open living room that overlooks central courtyard, great for reading, working on your laptop (there is WiFi), or relaxing at the end of the day. 

HEPA-filter air purifier runs 24/7 in living room. 

Full, well-appointed kitchen. 

Coffee, tea, sparkling water provided.
name: Sunny, Quiet 1 Bedroom in Union Sq/East Village
review: Michael's apartment is very nice overall. It's compact, which is usual for this location, and the location is excellent and very close to several subway lines. Michael's communication was excellent and the check-in process went smoothly despite my flight being delayed several hours. Just a couple small things to be aware of -- the front door key is tricky, and you have to pull it out almost a quarter inch for it to catch; and if you're more than six feet tall you won't really have room to stretch out in bed. All in all, I had a good stay. Thanks, Michael!
